name: Fly Owl
description:
A very addictive adventure game, don't miss it!
Just tap tap and make the owl fly.
Avoid the chocolate.
Collect fruits.

Features:
Very cute and clean graphics.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.

Enjoy!
